unknown_responses.rationale: The segment describes case details, not a capability or preparedness measure.
Describes a necessary action/analysis ('Analysing the genetic data... will be necessary') without calming keywords.
Describes a testing/confirmation process ('Samples... were tested... and confirmed') without calming keywords.
Describes a response action ('All remaining birds were culled') without calming keywords.
Describes a response action ('suspended its poultry exports') without calming keywords.
